name: OpenID: GitLab signin on mobile apps
precondition: There are other GitLab tests in Selenium: AuthGitLab.html

customFields.Update notes:
Linda 19 Aug 2022: Updated "OAuth" to "OpenID"

Lindy Isherwood, October 21, 2020 09:49AM
  • Marked this test N/A for Rainforest as it is not possible to authenticate via GitLab on the VMs

inline.description:
Use mobile apps to log in using GitLab

19. On Android, log in using GitLab
20. On iOS, log in using GitLab
inline.expectedResult: - Login is successful on mobile apps using GitLab

inline.description:
Non-Editable Profile Fields
---------------
1. Login using GitLab
2. Account Settings > Edit Profile
inline.expectedResult:
After #2,
- Verify the following fields are not editable (disabled and grayed out)
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Username
  • Email
